content: Who directed the 1993 blockbuster movie 'Jurassic Park', based on a novel of the same name by Michael Crichton?

The 1993 blockbuster movie 'Jurassic Park' was directed by Steven Spielberg. The film is based on the novel of the same name by Michael Crichton and was a groundbreaking success, blending innovative special effects with a compelling storyline.
